actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the production and procurement by any agency of the United States of any delivery system designed to disseminate any binary-type chemical warfare agent.

summary.text: Provides that no funds authorized or appropriated by any Act for fiscal year 1976 or any fiscal year thereafter for the Department of Defense may be used by any U. S. department, agency, or instrumentality to procure any delivery system which is designed to disseminate any binary-type chemical warfare agent, or to establish any facility for the production of any such system or part thereof.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the production and procurement by any agency of the United States of any delivery system designed to disseminate any binary-type chemical warfare agent.
